QuestData.Title: Claim the Battle Scar
QuestData.Description: We have fought the Alliance to a standstill here, even as the land beneath our feet falls apart. To the east you will find the Battlescar, a wide swath of decimated terrain. It is little more than a line in the sand, but it must be OUR line.$B$BIn the center of the scar you will find a flag marker designating who controls it. Scout out the flag.$B$BIf it's not already ours, capture it for the Horde - it will swing the battle in our favor. Investigate the scar and kill anyone you find in there!
QuestData.LogDescription: Go to the Battlescar. Scout out the flag marker and kill 10 Triumph Vanguard soldiers.$B$BCapturing the flag will give all Horde players in the scar a combat advantage.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you pushed them all the way back to their gates?
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent! You're my kind of $c, $n.$B$BWith your help, we will throw these invaders back into the sea.
